name: My Windows Are Bolted
description:
Here we are again. You've just been thrown into the chamber. No knowledge of why or how you got here. All you know, and need to know, is that they are closing in on your position. The past doesn't matter, nor does the future, what does matter is here, right now. How many are you gonna take down with you this time?

My Windows Are Bolted is a top-down shoot 'em up made with GameMaker: Studio. There is no "objective", just go in and rack up the highest body count out of all of your friends.

If you do have any suggestions, problems or bugs to report, please post them in the comments below. Thanks in advance!
